value.title: Male AI robot appears to grope female reporter during interview at tech expo
value.excerpt: An AI robot called Muhammad touched a female reporter’s backside during a Saudi Arabia tech expo. The android acted ‘independently without direct human control.’

value.title: Cambrian Robotics obtains seed funding to provide vision for complex tasks
value.excerpt: Cambrian will use the funding to continue its mission of giving industrial robots human-level capabilities for complex tasks.

value.title: Hugging Face is launching an open source robotics project led by former Tesla scientist
value.excerpt: Remi Cadene's move signals an ambitious expansion for Hugging Face, which until now, has primarily focused on software, not hardware.

value.title: The Integral Role Of Robotics, AI And Automation In Healthcare
value.excerpt: With the advent of robotics, automation and artificial intelligence (AI), we are not merely witnessing a change in how healthcare is delivered; we are at the dawn of a new era where the boundaries of what is possible are being redefined.

value.title: This Startup Figures the Best Way to Control Drones Is Talking to Them
value.excerpt: Connecticut-based Primordial Labs has developed a voice-based interface for small UAVs. A soldier simply speaks into a radio and tells the drone what to do.

value.title: Learn about generative AI’s impact on robotics at the Robotics Summit & Expo
value.excerpt: Researchers are already using generative AI to make robots faster learners, and a summit panel will discuss how it can be applied at scale.

value.title: Orlando Health Embraces Cutting-Edge Robotics Technology
value.excerpt: Robotic arms of a robotic surgical system demonstrate how doctors at Orlando Health Cancer Institute use the system during procedures for treatment of lung cancer. Orlando Health recognizes the pivotal role of technology in providing high-quality healthcare.

value.title: $675 Million For Humanoid ChatGPT Robot, Ideogram Gen AI Raises $80 Million
value.excerpt: Ideogram Text-to-Image Midjourney competitor Raises $80 M. This values the company well north of $1 Billion. Andressen Horowitz led the round. Ideogram 1.0 has an amazingly effective feature called Magic Prompt, which created the image above.

value.title: OpenAI collaborates with robotics firm Figure AI, to share next-gen AI models for humanoids
value.excerpt: The collaboration will combine OpenAI’s research with Figure’s deep understanding of robotics both hardware and software.

value.title: Humanoid robot-maker Figure partners with OpenAI
value.excerpt: California-based Figure announced the partnership Thursday along with $675 million in venture capital funding.

value.title: ChatGPT in Robot Form? OpenAI Partners With Humanoid Robotics Maker
value.excerpt: OpenAI is joining Microsoft, Nvidia, and Jeff Bezos in investing in Figure, a company that's developing human-like robots to rival Tesla's Optimus project.

value.title: Robotics startup Figure raises $675 mln from Microsoft, Nvidia, other big techs
value.excerpt: Robotics startup Figure said on Thursday it had raised $675 million in an early-stage funding from investors including Nvidia , Microsoft and Amazon.com founder Jeff Bezos at a valuation of $2.6 billion.

value.title: ABB eyes AI-robotics integration to push growth in various businesses
value.excerpt: ABB Ltd will integrate artificial intelligence with robotics across various sectors in China to sustain robust growth, senior executives of the Swiss-Swedish technology and engineering group said, as AI continues to evolve at an unprecedented pace, transforming numerous industries.

value.title: Dubai: Robot to detect e-scooter, cycle violations

value.title: Microsoft, OpenAI and Nvidia back $2.6bn robot start-up
value.excerpt: Microsoft, OpenAI and Nvidia are among the investors backing a Silicon Valley start-up that aims to introduce artificial intelligence-powered humanoid robots to the workforce and transform the global labour market. Figure AI said on Thursday it had raised ...

value.title: Meet Verdie – An electric, AI-powered robot that can do all your landscaping [Video]
value.excerpt: Electric Sheep – an artificial intelligence and robotics company specializing in large-scale landscaping operations, has announced a new autonomous robot to its fleet – Verdie. This electric robot can work alongside Electric Sheep’s other products ...

value.title: Amazon to spend $1 billion on startups that combine AI with robots
value.excerpt: Amazon has innovated in robotics before: in 2022, the company said it had invested more than 400 million euros in technologies that include industrial robotics and sorting systems in its European warehouses. It has deployed 750,000 mobile robots across its operations network.

value.title: B-Tech in robotics, AI among new courses at Noida's Gautam Buddha University
value.excerpt: BTech in robotics and artificial intelligence are among the 16 new courses along with 139 existing ones at the state-run Gautam Buddha University here for which admissions opened on Tuesday, officials said.

value.title: Here Come the Killer Robots
value.excerpt: While we’ve had versions of autonomous weapons systems for decades, the latest advances in AI have made today’s killer robots more sophisticated. Popular autonomous weapons systems include drones that can fly themselves, autonomous drone swarms, and AI targeting systems that automatically choose their targets.

value.title: Elon Musk unveils new footage of Tesla's Optimus robot showing improved mobility and speed

value.title: Digital Digits: AI+Robotics+Energy Converge, Reshaping Our World
value.excerpt: The robots reshaping our world are tackling a wide spectrum of tasks, from factory to warehouse, urban and the field to space exploration and beyond.
